alert.note: Alert for Estancia Valley; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 11:04AM MST until January 12 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Estancia Valley, San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands, Southwest Mountains, and West Central Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 2 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Estancia Valley; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains; West Central Mountains
